column1: The '''Chubb-Baggins Family''' was a family created by the wedding of [[Bilbo Baggins]]'s uncle [[Bingo Baggins]] to [[Chica Chubb]]. Double surnames were not uncommon in [[the Shire]], and were used when the daughter of the head of the family married. This way, the family name would be preserved.<ref>{{L
The Chubb-Bagginses were part of the [[Baggins Family]].<ref>{{App
column2: Baggins}}</ref> The figures after the names are those of birth (and death where that is recorded). Names in ''italics'' signify those who attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]] on [[22 September]] {{SR
